verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on daEak-a-v

frameset.edef: to rub or scrub or scour, to degrade

example.parse: (TOP (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3P ظَهَرُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADVP-TMP (ADV دِلْوَقْتِي)) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ لَمّا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3P دَعَكُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN الناس)) (PP-LOC (PREP فِي) (NP (DET+NOUN الشارِع)))))))) (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS دَه)) (NP-PRD (NP (DET+NOUN الوَقْت)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON اللِي)) (S (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِظهَرُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADVP (ADV بَسّ)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ُه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))))))))))
